item.title: 5 tangled Lime bikes obstructing pavement, 11th January
item.description:
These 5 bikes have collapsed onto the pavement and are entangled. They are obstructing the pavement for wheelchair or pram users due to proximity of large tree

item.title: Tesco trolley left outside property on Allen Road, 11th January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Allen Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 11th January
item.description:
Van has been parked for months with a number of PCNs. Seems to be abandoned or stolen as jts a work vehicle. Needs to be moved as its blocking the road and will become a nuisance over time

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kidderpore avenue, 11th January
item.description:
There needs to be a bollard on the double yellow lines at the end of Penrose Gardens on Kidderpore ave. I have complained numerous times. People park on the double yellows and block the visibility coming out of Penrose. Its dangerous as there are school children and people at church and anyone exiting the road. Please do something about it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidderpore Avenue, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Contents of car and house jettisoned on street, 11th January
item.description:
Another morning of waking up to be greeted by the detritus of someone who sees our street as a perfect place to dump stuff they no longer want .. the irony of the position this latest dumping under the ineffective Hackney control signage speaks volumes.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bushberry Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
